job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an SDET/QA Engineer, you will play a key role in ensuring our software solutions meet the highest standards of reliability and performance that are tied to our mission. Join our engineering team, where you will play a key role in ensuring our software solutions meet the highest standards of reliability and performance that are tied to our mission.
   As an SDET/QA Engineer, you will:
     * Design, develop, and maintain automated testing frameworks and systems.
     * Collaborate with development teams to write comprehensive unit tests.
     * Participate in the continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes.
     * Analyze test results, troubleshoot issues, and improve the areas of weakness in our applications.
     * Work closely with other engineers and product managers to ensure that all aspects of quality are being addressed throughout the software development lifecycle., * Develop and execute automated tests to ensure product quality.
     * Design and implement testing tools and frameworks to automate test processes.
     * Enhance and maintain excellent test coverage throughout the software development lifecycle.
     * Collaborate with development teams to understand new features and create appropriate testing strategies.
     * Report, track, and manage any discovered defects.
     * Build fully automated regression suite
     * Develop CI/CD pipeline to ensure services are thoroughly-tested prior to production deployments.
job_details.full_text:
SDET/QA Engineer

As an SDET/QA Engineer, you will play a key role in ensuring our software solutions meet the highest standards of reliability and performance that are tied to our mission. Join our engineering team, where you will play a key role in ensuring our software solutions meet the highest standards of reliability and performance that are tied to our mission.
   As an SDET/QA Engineer, you will:
     * Design, develop, and maintain automated testing frameworks and systems.
     * Collaborate with development teams to write comprehensive unit tests.
     * Participate in the continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes.
     * Analyze test results, troubleshoot issues, and improve the areas of weakness in our applications.
     * Work closely with other engineers and product managers to ensure that all aspects of quality are being addressed throughout the software development lifecycle., * Develop and execute automated tests to ensure product quality.
     * Design and implement testing tools and frameworks to automate test processes.
     * Enhance and maintain excellent test coverage throughout the software development lifecycle.
     * Collaborate with development teams to understand new features and create appropriate testing strategies.
     * Report, track, and manage any discovered defects.
     * Build fully automated regression suite
     * Develop CI/CD pipeline to ensure services are thoroughly-tested prior to production deployments.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on Software Development (TASK4) and Operations Engineering (MLOps) (TASK5) specifically for testing and quality assurance. It does not involve core AI/ML tasks like modeling, data engineering for AI, or generative AI specific development, which are central to the ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's a traditional software engineering role focused on QA.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing, developing, and maintaining automated testing frameworks and systems, writing unit tests, and collaborating with development teams to ensure software quality throughout the lifecycle. This directly aligns with traditional software engineering practices focused on building and testing software.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and maintain automated testing frameworks and systems

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with development teams to write comprehensive unit tests is a core software development activity focused on ensuring code quality at the unit level.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with development teams to write comprehensive unit tests

job_tasks.justification: Participating in CI/CD processes and developing CI/CD pipelines to ensure services are thoroughly tested prior to production deployments are key aspects of operations engineering for software delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in the continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes

job_tasks.justification: Analyzing test results, troubleshooting issues, and improving areas of weakness in applications are part of the software development lifecycle, specifically related to quality assurance and bug fixing.
job_tasks.phrase: Analyze test results, troubleshoot issues, and improve the areas of weakness in our applications

job_tasks.justification: Working closely with other engineers and product managers to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle is a collaborative software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with other engineers and product managers to ensure that all aspects of quality are being addressed throughout the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.justification: Developing and executing automated tests is a fundamental part of ensuring product quality within software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and execute automated tests to ensure product quality

job_tasks.justification: Designing and implementing testing tools and frameworks to automate test processes falls under software development, specifically for testing infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and implement testing tools and frameworks to automate test processes

job_tasks.justification: Enhancing and maintaining excellent test coverage throughout the software development lifecycle is a key responsibility in ensuring software quality.
job_tasks.phrase: Enhance and maintain excellent test coverage throughout the software development lifecycle

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with development teams to understand new features and create appropriate testing strategies is a crucial part of the software development process.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with development teams to understand new features and create appropriate testing strategies

job_tasks.justification: Reporting, tracking, and managing discovered defects is a standard part of the software development lifecycle for quality assurance.
job_tasks.phrase: Report, track, and manage any discovered defects

job_tasks.justification: Building a fully automated regression suite is a software development task focused on ensuring stability of the application through repeated testing.
Developing a CI/CD pipeline to ensure services are thoroughly tested prior to production deployments is a core MLOps/DevOps responsibility for automated software delivery.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop CI/CD pipeline to ensure services are thoroughly-tested prior to production deployments

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with other engineers and product managers
